Posts.Content: Jan 30, 2010 10:00AM chinit0 wrote: my mom is in for the altto. she's having paclitaxel + herceptin weekly for 12 sessions along with lapatinib. after 12 sessions, she'll have her herceptin once every 3 weeks, and lapatinib everyday for 1 year. she on it for 2 weeks now and currently, she's getting rashes over her face, arms, back and legs. i hope the rashes will fade soon because its getting itchy.
Posts.Title: Anyone in the ALTTO Clinical Trial nkrun Melinda41
